content:
XpsPackagingPolicy Class

In this Article

Defines the writer, resource, print ticket, and package relationship settings that are associated with a specified XpsDocument.

Syntax

Declaration

public class XpsPackagingPolicy : System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.BasePackagingPolicy

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.BasePackagingPolicy
  • XpsPackagingPolicy

Constructors summary

XpsPackagingPolicy(XpsDocument)

Initializes a new instance of the XpsPackagingPolicy class for a specified XpsDocument.
XpsPackagingPolicy(XpsDocument,PackageInterleavingOrder)

Initializes a new instance of the XpsPackagingPolicy class with a specified XpsDocument and specified interleave order.

Properties summary

CurrentFixedDocumentUri

Gets the uniform resource identifier (URI) of the current fixed document.
CurrentFixedPageUri

Gets the uniform resource identifier (URI) of the current fixed page.

Methods summary

AcquireResourceStreamForXpsColorContext(String)

Acquires the resource stream for a specified XpsColorContext.
AcquireResourceStreamForXpsFont()

Acquires the XpsResourceStream for the current XpsFont.

Acquires the XpsResourceStream for a specified XpsFont.

Acquires the resource stream for a specified XpsImage.

Acquires the resource stream for a specified XpsResourceDictionary.

Returns a list of stem.Windows.Documents.PageContent.LinkTargets* for the current page content.

Acquires the XmlWriter for the current FixedDocument.

Acquires the XmlWriter for the current FixedDocumentSequence.

Acquires the XmlWriter for the current FixedPage.

Acquires the XmlWriter for the current page.
AcquireXmlWriterForResourceDictionary()

Acquires the XmlWriter for the current XpsResourceDictionary.

Stores a specified PrintTicket as part of the XpsDocument.

Prepares to commit the current page to the output store.
RelateResourceToCurrentPage(Uri,String)

Adds a PackageRelationship with a specified name that associates a specified resource with the current page.
RelateRestrictedFontToCurrentDocument(Uri)

Adds a PackageRelationship that associates a restricted font with the current document.
ReleaseResourceStreamForXpsColorContext()

Releases the XpsResourceStream for the current XpsColorContext.

Releases the XpsResourceStream for the current XpsFont.

Releases the XpsResourceStream for a specified XpsFont.

Releases the XpsResourceStream for the current XpsImage.

Releases the XpsResourceStream for the current XpsResourceDictionary.

Releases the XmlWriter for the current FixedDocument.

Releases the XmlWriter for the current FixedDocumentSequence.
ReleaseXmlWriterForFixedPage()

Releases the XmlWriter for the current FixedPage.

Events summary

PackagingProgressEvent

Occurs when a FixedPage, FixedDocument, or FixedDocumentSequence is added to the XpsDocument.

Constructors

  • XpsPackagingPolicy(XpsDocument)

    Initializes a new instance of the XpsPackagingPolicy class for a specified XpsDocument.

    public XpsPackagingPolicy (System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument xpsPackage);

    Parameters

    • xpsPackage
      XpsDocument

      The XpsDocument that is associated with this XpsPackagingPolicy.

  • XpsPackagingPolicy(XpsDocument,PackageInterleavingOrder)

    Initializes a new instance of the XpsPackagingPolicy class with a specified XpsDocument and specified interleave order.

    public XpsPackagingPolicy (System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument xpsPackage, System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder interleavingType);

    Parameters

    • xpsPackage
      XpsDocument

      The XML Paper Specification (XPS) document that the packaging policy applies to.

    • interleavingType
      PackageInterleavingOrder

      The order in which to interleave document elements.

Properties

  • CurrentFixedDocumentUri

    Gets the uniform resource identifier (URI) of the current fixed document.

    public override Uri CurrentFixedDocumentUri { get; }

    Property Value

    • Uri

      The URI of the current fixed document.

  • CurrentFixedPageUri

    Gets the uniform resource identifier (URI) of the current fixed page.

    public override Uri CurrentFixedPageUri { get; }

    Property Value

    • Uri

      The URI of the current fixed page.

    Parameters

      String

      The resource identifier of the color context.

    Returns

    • XpsResourceStream

      The resource stream for the XpsColorContext that has the specified resourceId.

      The resource stream for the current XpsFont.

    Parameters

    • resourceId
      String

      The identifier of the XML Paper Specification (XPS) font.

    Returns

    • XpsResourceStream

      The resource stream for the XML Paper Specification (XPS) font that has the specified resourceId.

  • AcquireResourceStreamForXpsImage(String)

    Acquires the resource stream for a specified XpsImage.

    public override System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream AcquireResourceStreamForXpsImage (string resourceId);

    Parameters

    • resourceId
      String

      The resource identifier of the XML Paper Specification (XPS) image.

    Returns

    • XpsResourceStream

      The resource stream for the XpsImage that has the specified resourceId.

  • AcquireResourceStreamForXpsResourceDictionary(String)

    Acquires the resource stream for a specified XpsResourceDictionary.

    public override System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream AcquireResourceStreamForXpsResourceDictionary (string resourceId);

    Parameters

    • resourceId
      String

      The identifier of the resource dictionary.

    Returns

    • XpsResourceStream

      The XML Paper Specification (XPS) resource stream for the XpsResourceDictionary that has the specified resourceId.

  • AcquireStreamForLinkTargets()

    Returns a list of stem.Windows.Documents.PageContent.LinkTargets* for the current page content.

    public override System.Collections.Generic.IList<string> AcquireStreamForLinkTargets ();

    Returns

    • IList<String>

      The list of stem.Windows.Documents.PageContent.LinkTargets* for the current page content.

  • AcquireXmlWriterForFixedDocument()

    Acquires the XmlWriter for the current FixedDocument.

    public override System.Xml.XmlWriter AcquireXmlWriterForFixedDocument ();

    Returns

    • XmlWriter

      The XML writer for the current FixedDocument.

  • AcquireXmlWriterForFixedDocumentSequence()

    Acquires the XmlWriter for the current FixedDocumentSequence.

    public override System.Xml.XmlWriter AcquireXmlWriterForFixedDocumentSequence ();

    Returns

    • XmlWriter

      The XML writer for the current FixedDocumentSequence.

  • AcquireXmlWriterForFixedPage()

    Acquires the XmlWriter for the current FixedPage.

    Returns

      The XML writer for the current FixedPage.

  • AcquireXmlWriterForPage()

    Acquires the XmlWriter for the current page.

    public override System.Xml.XmlWriter AcquireXmlWriterForPage ();

    Returns

    • XmlWriter

      The XML writer for the current FixedPage.

  • AcquireXmlWriterForResourceDictionary()

    Acquires the XmlWriter for the current XpsResourceDictionary.

    public override System.Xml.XmlWriter AcquireXmlWriterForResourceDictionary ();

    Returns

    • XmlWriter

      The XML writer for the current XpsResourceDictionary.

  • PersistPrintTicket(PrintTicket)

    Stores a specified PrintTicket as part of the XpsDocument.

    public override void PersistPrintTicket (System.Printing.PrintTicket printTicket);

    Parameters

    • printTicket
      PrintTicket

      The print ticket to store as part of the XML Paper Specification (XPS) document.

    Remarks

    This method does not validate or modify the specified printTicket for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>. If necessary, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a PrintTicket that is specific to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> and is valid for a specified printer.

  • PreCommitCurrentPage()

    Prepares to commit the current page to the output store.

    public override void PreCommitCurrentPage ();
  • RelateResourceToCurrentPage(Uri,String)

    Adds a PackageRelationship with a specified name that associates a specified resource with the current page.

    public override void RelateResourceToCurrentPage (Uri targetUri, string relationshipName);

    Parameters

    • targetUri
      Uri

      The uniform resource identifier (URI) of the resource to associate with the current page.

    • relationshipName
      String

      The identifying name of the PackageRelationship that associates the current page with the specified resource.

  • RelateRestrictedFontToCurrentDocument(Uri)

    Adds a PackageRelationship that associates a restricted font with the current document.

    public override void RelateRestrictedFontToCurrentDocument (Uri targetUri);

    Parameters

    • targetUri
      Uri

      The uniform resource identifier (URI) of the restricted font to associate with the current document.

  • ReleaseResourceStreamForXpsColorContext()

    Releases the XpsResourceStream for the current XpsColorContext.

    public override void ReleaseResourceStreamForXpsColorContext ();

    Releases the XpsResourceStream for the current XpsFont.

    public override void ReleaseResourceStreamForXpsFont ();
  • ReleaseResourceStreamForXpsFont(String)

    Releases the XpsResourceStream for a specified XpsFont.

    public override void ReleaseResourceStreamForXpsFont (string resourceId);

    Parameters

    • resourceId
      String

      The identifier of the XML Paper Specification (XPS) font that you want to release.

  • ReleaseResourceStreamForXpsImage()

    Releases the XpsResourceStream for the current XpsImage.

    public override void ReleaseResourceStreamForXpsImage ();
  • ReleaseResourceStreamForXpsResourceDictionary()

    Releases the XpsResourceStream for the current XpsResourceDictionary.

    public override void ReleaseResourceStreamForXpsResourceDictionary ();
  • ReleaseXmlWriterForFixedDocument()

    Releases the XmlWriter for the current FixedDocument.

    public override void ReleaseXmlWriterForFixedDocument ();
  • ReleaseXmlWriterForFixedDocumentSequence()

    Releases the XmlWriter for the current FixedDocumentSequence.

    public override void ReleaseXmlWriterForFixedDocumentSequence ();
  • ReleaseXmlWriterForFixedPage()

    Releases the XmlWriter for the current FixedPage.

    public override void ReleaseXmlWriterForFixedPage ();

Events

  • PackagingProgressEvent

    Occurs when a FixedPage, FixedDocument, or FixedDocumentSequence is added to the XpsDocument.

    public event System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventHandler PackagingProgressEvent;
